to.plot$scatter

    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = 'loess') +
    xlab('Gestation (days)') + ylab('TEMPLATE') +
    theme_bw() +
    ggtitle('TEMPLATE v Gestation') +
    labs(colour = 'VTE Status')
